Inventory Sync System V5
========================================

Version: 5.0
Build Date: 2025/12/03 ¶g¤T 18:45:49.98

New Features in V5:
- Yahoo expired product filtering (8,795 products filtered)
- Automatic spec extraction from product names
- Complete Google Sheets integration
- Dashboard web interface
- Cross-platform inventory comparison

Components:
- ExpiredProductManager: Manages 22,050 Yahoo products
- Updated yahoo_client.py with filtering
- Enhanced database schema with history tables
- Complete sync_manager with all V4 features
- Dashboard web interface

Usage:
1. Run InventorySync_V5.exe
2. Open dashboard/index.html in browser
3. View sync results and inventory data
